p: The new interest of the pharmaceutical industries in essential oils as possible natural substances to replace synthetic drugs and preservatives has redirected the focus of many researchers. This study revealed that the essential oil of E.Â caffra stem bark extract possess antimicrobial and good antioxidant activities. Since antioxidants play a major role in managing some free radical-related diseases like cancers, the essential oil of Erythrina caffra with its rich level of phytochemicals can be used as either dietary or complementary agents. In addition, the oil may be explored for the development of useful plant-based pharmaceuticals, food preservatives and as carriers of other additives such as flavor in processed foods and fragrance in cosmetic production. Furthermore, in vivo studies may be carried out to reconfirm the lipid lowering activity of the essential oil.
